name: Track O Treat
description:
This is a very simple game in which we have to race against time as well as other cars. We have tried to keep the controls as simple and easy to use as possible, and we hope that we will be able to expand our game further. 

Controls are: 

W - accelerate

A - turn left

D - turn right

S -  deaccelerate

Space Bar - Hand-Brake

This was a part of our curriculum at VIT Bhopal.

By:

Shubh Singh , Mayank Tripathi , Om Mani Tripathi , Mayank Kumar Patel, Abhigyan Chaudhary

Reference: https://www.udemy.com/course/make-a-driving-game-in-unity/
